# about

## Basic information

- Description
Number of deaths among residents under age 75 per 100,000 population (age-adjusted).

- What is the numerator?
The numerator is the number of total deaths under the age of 75.

- What is the denominator?
The denominator is the total population under the age of 75.

## Raw data access

- NCHS mortality and natality data 2020-2022: the data is requested

- Census population estimates 2020-2022 from:

2020 Census Population Estimates: https://www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest/datasets/2010-2020/counties/asrh/CC-EST2020-ALLDATA.csv

2021 Census Population Estimates: https://www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest/datasets/2020-2021/counties/asrh/cc-est2021-all.csv

2022 Census Population Estimates: https://www2.census.gov/programs-surveys/popest/datasets/2020-2022/counties/asrh/cc-est2022-all.csv

## Subgroups

- non-Hispanic, White only, 
- non-Hispanic, Black only, 
- non-Hispanic, AIAN only, 
- non-Hispanic, Asian only, 
- non-Hispanic, NHOPI only, 
- non-Hispanic, Two or More Races
- Hispanic

## function: process pop data for v127

```{r}
process_pop_v127 <- function(year, by_race_TF = TRUE){
  pop <- read_census_pop(file_name = get_census_csv_file_info(year)$file_name ) %>% 
    get_census_pop_by_agecat_race(get_census_csv_file_info(year)$year_num, by_race = by_race_TF, age_cat_version = "v127")
  
  return(pop)
}
```

## function: process mort data for v127

```{r}
process_mort_v127 <- function(year, by_race_TF = TRUE){
  
  print(get_mort_file_name(year))
  
  mort <- read_mort_data(
    file_path = file.path(nchs_mort_dir, get_mort_file_name(year) ), 
    header = mort_header,
    n_max = Inf) %>% 
    get_mort_data_by_agecat_race(df_fips=fips, by_race = by_race_TF, age_cat_version = "v127")
  
  return(mort)
}

```


# Pop data

## NCHS birth data: age_cat = 0

- Use births data to approximate infant population (age_cat = 0), as Census county-level population estimates use 5-year age groups and do not have age_cat = 0.

- The NCHS birth data was aggregated by state, county, age category, and race/ethnicity group.

```{r}
yrs <- c(2020:2022)

infant_pop <- 
  get_infant_pop(
    yrs, 
    file.path(nchs_nata_dir, "nchs_births_2014_2022.csv"), 
    by_race = TRUE) %>% 
  glimpse()

infant_pop
```

## Census pop data 2020-2022 by age cat 1-8 

```{r}
pop_agecat_1_8 <- bind_rows(
  process_pop_v127(2020),
  process_pop_v127(2021),
  process_pop_v127(2022) %>% 
    fix_CT_pop(process_pop_v127(2021))
  ) %>% 
  group_by(statecode, countycode, race, age_cat) %>% 
  summarise(pop = sum(pop, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop") %>% 
  glimpse()
```

## combine age cat 0 with age cat 1-8

```{r}
pop_all <- 
  bind_rows(
    # age_cat = 2 to 8
    pop_agecat_1_8 %>% filter(age_cat!=1),
    
    # age_cat = 0
    c(1:6, 8) %>% 
      map_df(~mutate(fips %>% select(1:2), race = .)) %>% 
      mutate(age_cat = 0) %>% 
      left_join(infant_pop, by = c('statecode', 'countycode', 'age_cat', 'race')) %>% 
      mutate(pop = if_else(is.na(pop), 0, pop)),
    
    # fixed age_cat = 1
    pop_agecat_1_8 %>% 
      filter(age_cat==1) %>% 
      bind_rows(infant_pop) %>% 
      arrange(statecode, countycode, age_cat) %>% 
      pivot_wider(names_from = age_cat, values_from = pop, names_glue = "pop_{age_cat}") %>% 
      mutate(pop = if_else(is.na(pop_0), pop_1, pop_1 - pop_0)) %>% 
      select(-c(pop_0, pop_1)) %>% 
      mutate(age_cat = 1)
    ) %>% 
    arrange(statecode, countycode, race, age_cat) %>%
    # set negative pop as 0; example: 15005
    # mutate(pop = if_else(pop<0, 0, pop)) %>%
    # remove 02261
    filter(!(statecode == "02" & countycode == "261") ) 

pop_all  
```

## pop <0 

```{r}
pop_all %>%
```

```{r}
mort_all <- bind_rows(
  process_mort_v127(2020), 
  process_mort_v127(2021),
  process_mort_v127(2022)
) %>%
  group_by(statecode, countycode, age_cat, race) %>%
  summarise(deaths = sum(deaths, na.rm = TRUE), .groups = "drop") %>%
  filter(age_cat != 99) %>%
  glimpse()
```

# mortality calculation

## merge mort and pop data

```{r}
merged <- pop_all %>% 
  left_join(mort_all %>% ungroup(), 
            by = c("statecode", "countycode", "age_cat", "race")) %>% 
  mutate(deaths = if_else(is.na(deaths), 0, deaths)) %>%
  glimpse()
  
```

## add weight for age ajustment

```{r}
wtd <- 258059676 # /*population under 75; Census 2000 model*/

merged_2 <- merged %>% 
  mutate(wtn = get_age_wtn(age_cat, version = "v127")) %>% 
  mutate(wt = wtn/wtd,
         age_adj=deaths/pop*wtn/wtd*100000,
         no_age_adj=deaths/pop*100000,
         wk_var = (wt**2)*((no_age_adj**2)/(deaths))) %>% 
  group_by(statecode, countycode, race) %>% 
  summarise(numerator = sum(deaths, na.rm = TRUE),
            denominator = sum(pop, na.rm = TRUE),
            rawvalue = sum(age_adj, na.rm = TRUE), 
            # calculate std
            stdev = sqrt(sum(wk_var, na.rm = TRUE)),
            .groups = "drop") %>% 
  glimpse()
```

## confidence Intervals

```{r}
v127_1 <- merged_2 %>% 
  mutate(cilow = rawvalue - 1.96*stdev, 
         cihigh = rawvalue + 1.96*stdev,
         relative_standard_error = (stdev/rawvalue)) %>% 
  # select(-stdev) %>% 
  mutate(flag2 = if_else(relative_standard_error > 0.2, 
                         1, NA_real_)) %>% 
  mutate(flag2 = if_else(numerator < 20, 2, flag2)) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(numerator, denominator, rawvalue, cilow, cihigh), ~ as.double(.x))) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(numerator, denominator, rawvalue, cilow, cihigh), 
                ~ if_else(!is.na(flag2) & flag2 == 2, 
                                            NA_real_, .x))) %>% 
  mutate(test_cb=round((rawvalue**2)/(stdev**2), digits = 0))

v127_1
```

## calculate CI L and U for n<100

```{r}
v127_2 <- v127_1 %>% 
  left_join(get_pois_CI(), by = c("test_cb" = "n")) %>% 
  # mutate(flag2 = if_else(v001_numerator<20, 
  #                        2, flag2)) %>%
  mutate(cilow = if_else(numerator>=20 & numerator <=99,
                         rawvalue * L, cilow),
         cihigh = if_else(numerator>=20 & numerator <=99,
                         rawvalue * U, cihigh)) %>% 
  # mutate(v001_sourceflag = NA_real_) %>% 
  mutate(flag2 = if_else(relative_standard_error > 0.2 & flag2!=2, 
                         1, flag2)) %>% 
  select(-c(relative_standard_error, test_cb, L, U)) %>% 
  mutate(across(c(numerator, denominator, rawvalue, cilow, cihigh), 
                ~ if_else(!is.na(flag2) & flag2 == 2, 
                                            NA_real_, .x))) %>% 
  rename(ypll_se=stdev, flag2_cb = flag2) %>% 
  # fix se for 15005
  mutate(ypll_se = if_else(statecode=="15" & countycode =="005",
                           NA_real_, ypll_se)) %>% 
  # replace inf with NA
  mutate(across(c(rawvalue, ypll_se), ~if_else(is.infinite(.), NA, .))) %>% 
  select(-c(ypll_se, flag2_cb)) 

v127_2

```

- 'A' = data *available* for a CT county
- 'U' = data *unavailable* for a CT county

```{r}

  add_flag_CT(vnum = "v127_race", old="A", new = "U")

v127_other_2
```
